title: Kaffara Majlis
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Kaffara Majlis. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 196
items.arabic: ((سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ)).
items.transliteration: Subhanakal-lahumma wabihamdik, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, astaghfiruka wa-atoobu ilayk.
items.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You.  I bear witness that None has the right to be worshipped except You.  I seek Your forgiveness and turn to You in repentance.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: Kaffara Majlis
